entities.name: dowsill
entities.description: Dowsill is mentioned as someone who smirks while throwing Harry's wand into the air.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry's wand was thrown by Dowsill and caught again.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of the students who were gagged and held by Slytherins.

entities.name: ginn y
entities.description: Ginny was trying to kick the shins of a large Slytherin girl holding her.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is one of the students who were gagged and held by Slytherins.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville was trapped in a stranglehold by Crabbe and looked in imminent danger of suffocation.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is one of the Slytherins who held Neville in a stranglehold.

entities.name: warrington
entities.description: Warrington shoved Ron roughly forward into the room and mentioned that Neville tried to stop him taking Ginny.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge watched Ginny's struggles and said that Hogwarts will shortly be a Weasley-free zone.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy laughed loudly and sycophantically at Umbridge's statement.

entities.name: harry’s wand
entities.description: Harry's wand was thrown by Dowsill and caught again.

relationships.description: Warrington shoved Ron roughly forward into the room.
Crabbe held Neville in a stranglehold.
Warrington mentioned that Neville tried to stop him taking Ginny.
Umbridge watched Harry's wand being thrown by Dowsill.
Malfoy laughed loudly and sycophantically at Umbridge's statement.
Dowsill threw Harry's wand into the air.
